subtitle: A set cheesecake that doesn't require any cooking

method.text: Melt butter. Stir in biscuit crumbs. Spread over the base of a 20 cm / 8inch greased loose-bottom cake tin. Press down evenly. Chill.
Cream together the egg yolks, sugar and grated orange rind. Stir in the orange juice, dissolved gelatine and Wensleydale cheese. Mix well.
When almost set, whip the egg whites until stiff and fold into the cheese mixture. Pour into the tin. Decorate with orange slices and sprigs of mint.

title: Ginger cheesecake
